title: Flux.1 Image (FAL.ai)

userSettings.name: falApiKey
userSettings.label: FAL.ai API Key
userSettings.description: Enter your FAL.ai API key. You can get it from your fal.ai dashboard.

userSettings.name: defaultModel
userSettings.label: Default Flux model
userSettings.description: Choose which Flux.1 model to use by default (flux-pro, flux-dev, or flux-schnell).

overviewMarkdown:
## Flux.1 Image (FAL.ai)

This plugin generates images using Flux.1 models via the FAL.ai API.

**Requirements**: FAL.ai API key. Enter it in the plugin settings.

Example usage:
> Create a highly detailed Afrofuturist cityscape at sunset using Flux Pro.

openaiSpec.name: generate_flux_image
openaiSpec.description: Generate an image using a Flux.1 model via FAL.ai.

prompt.description: Main positive prompt describing the image.

negative_prompt.description: Optional negative prompt describing what to avoid.

model.description: Optional Flux model: flux-pro, flux-dev, or flux-schnell.
